sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Chinese_Traditional: 正義的戰爭哭泣是對當局的chagrin來說。
backtrans: The war of justice is crying for the CHAGRIN of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Chinese_Traditional: 該制度的決定使潛在的議程犯罪。
backtrans: The system decided to make potential agenda crimes.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Chinese_Traditional: 社區對急需改革的傳遞感到焦慮。
backtrans: The community is anxious about the transfer of urgently needed reform.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Chinese_Traditional: 智庫發表了一篇論文，概述了他們道歉的資本懲罰。
backtrans: The wisk is published in a papers and outlined the capital punishment of their apologies.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: AUGHT has left the validity of petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Chinese_Traditional: 總統勸告他的部長扣除作為對其經濟計劃的主要反對支持即將扣發。
backtrans: The president advised his ministers to deduct the main object of support for its economic plan.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Chinese_Traditional: 選民被淘汰，看看截至通過。
backtrans: Voters were eliminated and saw as of the pass.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Chinese_Traditional: 律師的話語敘述搖曳了陪審團。
backtrans: The discourse of lawyers swayed the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Chinese_Traditional: 歐盟塊反對最終徵收反傾銷措施。
backtrans: EU blocks oppose ultimately levy anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Chinese_Traditional: 一位富有律師的富豪悼詞。

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Chinese_Traditional: GIG經濟機構決定裝修退款！
backtrans: GIG economic institution decided to decorate refund!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Chinese_Traditional: 反科學革命運動的成員推翻了積極的同伴！
backtrans: Members of the anti-science revolutionary movement overturned a positive companion!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Chinese_Traditional: 叛徒令人失望地決定與殖民主義者戰鬥。
backtrans: The traitor disappoints decided to fight with colonialists.
